item.title: Heart Rush
item.description: Heart rush is a simple game. Drag your heart around, collect other hearts and grow bigger. Avoid any broken hearts, or youâ€™ll lose. Easily navigate with invisible joystick like controls. Heart rush was made on Valentines week of 2018. With :cupid: from Yarsa Games.
